issue.title: Imu and Contact sensors stop publishing after simulation is resetted

content.raw: Hello, now i have a login :). I'm looking at the ros topics, but as far as i can see, there is no gazebo topic diectly publishing the foot contact sensor data. I'm using the debian install for ubuntu 14.04, this is gazebo 4.1.3-1 and drcsim 5.0.0-1. I had a look at the (gazebo sensor class) code, and I think this is because the needsUpdate() function uses lastMeasurementTime to determine whether the sensor needs a new update, which isn't resetted in the Sensor classes reset function.
